blogPost.excerpt: Derived from the concept of planet rotation and all things of cosmos, The X Planet, an exquisite car freshener, is ingeniously designed in the shape of a planet.
blogPost.body: Derived from the concept of planet rotation and all things of cosmos, The X Planet, an exquisite car freshener, is ingeniously designed in the shape of a planet.
blogPost.title: X Planet - The Most Novel Car Freshener You Need
blogPost.author: Liso

localize.description: 源自行星自转和宇宙万物的概念，X星球这款精致的汽车清新剂，巧妙地设计成行星的形状。
localize.tagline: 你需要的最新奇的汽车清新剂

localize.description: 源自行星自轉和宇宙萬物的概念，X星球這款精緻的汽車清新劑，巧妙地設計成行星的形狀。
localize.tagline: 你需要的最新奇的汽車清新劑

previous.excerpt: This is a custom minecraft server and every time someone writes fuck 2020 into the twitch chat or clicks the button on the website, it will add a 🧨 TNT block to the block text 2020.
previous.title: Blowup 2020 - Let's get together  and tell 2020 to fuck off 🧨

localize.description: 这是一个定制的“我的世界”服务器，每当有人在抽搐聊天中写下“他妈的2020”或者点击网站上的按钮，它就会在挡路文本2020中添加一个🧨TnT挡路。
localize.tagline: 让我们一起告诉2020去他妈的🧨

localize.description: 這是一個定製的“我的世界”服務器，每當有人在抽搐聊天中寫下“他媽的2020”或者點擊網站上的按鈕，它就會在擋路文本2020中添加一個🧨TnT擋路。
localize.tagline: 讓我們一起告訴2020去他媽的🧨

next.excerpt: The clean, uncomplicated lines of classic European sports coupes like the BMW 3-series and Alpha Romeo Giulia are something that's been sorely missing from EVs for at least a decade. This changes with Alpha's ACE.
next.title: The Alpha Ace EV - An ideally sized personal vehicle with an electrifying soul.

localize.description: 像宝马3系和阿尔法·罗密欧·朱利亚(Alpha Romeo Giulia)这样的欧洲经典运动跑车干净、简单的线条，是电动汽车至少十年来严重缺失的东西。这一点随着阿尔法的ACE而改变。
localize.tagline: 一辆理想大小的私人汽车，有着令人兴奋的灵魂。

localize.description: 像寶馬3系和阿爾法·羅密歐·朱利亞(Alpha Romeo Giulia)這樣的歐洲經典運動跑車乾淨、簡單的線條，是電動汽車至少十年來嚴重缺失的東西。這一點隨着阿爾法的ACE而改變。
localize.tagline: 一輛理想大小的私人汽車，有着令人興奮的靈魂。
